name: Hell's Deli
description:
In Hell's Deli, your job is to make sandwiches. You are challenge with the task of being more efficient than the head chef.
You have an upper-hand, but also a weakness. Every 15 seconds, a contraption will roll 2 dice, giving you an upgrade, and a downgrade.

Developer - Pl0s
Art - Llamakorn
Music - zSubZer0
